name: laxar-command-bar-widget
description: Allows a user to trigger actions (such as navigation) using graphical buttons.

layout.description: Configures how the buttons are laid out on the screen.

areas.description: For each area, the number of grid columns which it takes up.

left.description: Number of columns to use for the left (vertical: top) area.

center.description: Number of columns to use for the middle area.

right.description: Number of columns to use for the right (vertical: bottom) area.

buttons.description: A list of user-configured buttons, each with individual properties.

enabled.description: Determines if the button is used at all (true) or ignored completely (false).

align.description: The area in which the button is inserted.

index.description: The position at which the button is inserted.

i18nHtmlLabel.description: An (internationalized) HTML label to display on the button.

action.description: Topic name of the action to request taking upon button activation.

accessKey.description: A key (single character) which is used as a shortcut to this button.

class.description: The predefined semantic class that this button belongs to.

size.description: The size of the button on the bar, interpreted according to theme.

hideOn.description: List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button to be hidden from view, unsetting any reverses the effect. Space for the button is reserved in either state.

items.description: Flag topic. Prefixing the topic with '!' inverts its meaning.

disableOn.description: List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button to be disabled ('greyed out'), unsetting any reverses the effect.

items.description: Flag topic. Prefixing the topic with '!' inverts its meaning.

omitOn.description: List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button to be removed from the layout, unsetting any reverses the effect. Other buttons may claim this button's space while it is omitted.

items.description: Flag topic. Prefixing the topic with '!' inverts its meaning.

busyOn.description: List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button (icon) to indicate a busy state, unsetting any reverses the effect.

items.description: Flag topic. Prefixing the topic with '!' inverts its meaning.

previous.description: A button to be used for 'back'-navigation. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

next.description: A button to be used for 'forwards'-navigation. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

ok.description: A button to be used for user confirmation. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

apply.description: A button to be used for popup confirmation. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

cancel.description: A button to be used for (popup) cancellation. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

yes.description: A button to be used for (popup) dialog approval. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

no.description: A button to be used for (popup) dialog disapproval. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

finish.description: A button to be used for process completion. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

info.description: A button to be used for information retrieval. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

help.description: A button to be used for requesting help. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

print.description: A button to be used for requesting a printout. All properties (cf. feature 'buttons') have applicable default values.

i18n.description: Which locale to use for displaying this widget.

locale.description: The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.
